title: Capturing electronic patient reported outcomes in oncology practice. - ASCO Publications

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: 78% of oncology practices report improved data quality with ePRO tools.
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Integrate AI-driven prompts to reduce missing data by 25%.
